speaker: OB
dialogueText: Hi [player name]! I’ve heard from Dr. Zero that you are here to help us with our research! I’m an intern at [company name].

speaker: OB
dialogueText: Yeah it’s all good! It’s a pet i just got. I found it all sad and lonely…

speaker: OB
dialogueText: Okay! I’ve just added a [notecard/dictionary] app to your [walkie talkie]. I inputted 7 words for you to get started with.

speaker: OB
dialogueText: Please come back when you have mastered the work!
